isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - REPAIR PROCEDURES - STATOR CHECKS (Omit for Overcharged Battery)

svcproc.title: STATOR CHECKS (Omit for Overcharged Battery)
svcproc.para: The stator windings may be checked with an ohmmeter. If the meter reading is low when connected from any stator lead to the frame, the windings are grounded (Step 4, Figure 8).

If the meter reading is high when successively connected between each pair of stator leads, the windings are open (Step 6, Figure 8). A short circuit in the stator windings is difficult to locate without laboratory test equipment due to the low resistance of the windings. However, if all other electrical checks are normal and the alternator fails to supply rated output, shorted stator windings are indicated.
